sections.general: sales associate professional profile reliable sales associate experienced in retail sales, well trained in product placement and merchandising. extensive experience in inventory management and shipment processing. knowledgeable of the fashion industry, including current trends. enthusiastic, trustworthy and fashion- savvy; with proficiency at building positive relationships with new and existing customers by offering superior customer service. i am â proficient in managing all areas of sales and customer service in fast-paced retail environments. excellent multi-tasker, friendly, knowledgeable and persistent team player, always pushing the people around me to do that extra step. along with retail, i have worked in the culinary field as an important aspect to the restaurant, being rewarded with promotions due to hard work and dedicated time. qualifications â merchandising upselling stocking strong interactive skills retail sales internet marketing credit card transactions social and new media meeting sale goals consistently point of sale (pos) system operation documentation familiarity passion for customer satisfactions accurate money handling â cash register familiarity sales expertise â inventory control customer orientedâ outgoing personality verbal/written communication team-player mentalityâ active listening skills

floor and promotional displays. operated cash register for cash and credit purchases. completed all point of sale opening and closing procedures, including counting contents of the register. educate customers of the brand to incite excitement about the company's missions and values. cleaned and organized the store met incoming customers and provided immediate assistance. retrieved alternate items momentarily. i was promoted from food runner to hostess and then to a server over the year i've worked there. listened to customer needs completed purchases with cash, credit and debit payment methods. trained new employees skillful on promoting food items sales associate 05/2015 to 11/2016 company name city , state increased purchase totals by recommending additional items. reviewed purchases for fraudulent activities. worked flexible schedule to accommodate changing customer levels. organized items in visually appealing manner. answered incoming telephone calls professionally excel to input management information listened to customer needs and preferences to provide accurate advice. answered incoming telephone calls with professional and knowledgeable responses. maintained up-to-date knowledge of customer buying habits.
sections.education: plantation high school city , state , usa graduate in august of 2016 affiliations cpr & aed certified & servsafe certified personal information i work very efficiently around people, or stressful situations. i am friendly and easy to get along with; i enjoy positive environments and i like to add a positive tone to any surrounding environment. authorized to work in the us for any employer. awarded in servsafe 2015, passing the national exam when the exam was provided to culinary students 3&4 at my school. i also participate in the culinary club from august 2014 to 2016. along with the key club from november 2015 to 2016 (community service club, working most of the time in no profit areas). also joined a fashionista from 2014-2016, group which we went to around to organizations donating old clothes and accessories. after my extensive participation and planning i was promoted to president of the club.
sections.skills: cashier, filing, inventory, leadership qualities, people skills, tables, team work, answering phones, good people skills, lead by example mentality â meeting retail goals efficiently.
